title: MACG-Net: Multi-axis cross gating network for deformable medical image registration
details: W Yuan, J Cheng, Y Gong, L He, J Zhang - Computers in Biology and Medicine, 2024
abstract: Deformable Image registration is a fundamental yet vital task for preoperative planning, intraoperative information fusion, disease diagnosis and follow-ups. It solves the non-rigid deformation field to align an image pair. Latest approaches such …

title: Deep Learning Approaches for Medical Image Analysis and Diagnosis
details: GK Thakur, A Thakur, S Kulkarni, N Khan, S Khan - Cureus, 2024
abstract: In addition to enhancing diagnostic accuracy, deep learning techniques offer the potential to streamline workflows, reduce interpretation time, and ultimately improve patient outcomes. The scalability and adaptability of deep learning algorithms enable …
